urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @sweetglife I am sorry for the long waiting time. You will find our contact options on this page: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @wirklichsofaul Use the "Message"/"Messenger" function on our Facebook page to send us a message and we will have a look at your booking.

@christerwallin5 De flesta resecheckarna är giltiga 1 år och du behöver oftast inte resa på dem innan giltighetstiden gått ut, utan huvudsaken bokningen är gjord innan dess. Du kan alltså boka resan och betala med resechecken innan den går ut, men själva resdatumen kan ligga längre fram i tiden.

Prime time has come for the northern lights, and travelers long for the north to get a glimpse of the vivid colors dancing across the night sky. 
Pilot Thomas Hjelset had the luxury of being seated front row for this magical light show during the approach to Bardufoss🌌 #flysas https://t.co/aypNMJV5lD

@mattcharnock1 I am sorry for the long waiting time. SAS is, like most airlines, severely hit by the corona crisis. That has led to an exceptionally long queue for refunds but I can assure you that we are doing out utmost to handle all errands as fast as we possibly can.

@aemachin I am sorry for the long waiting time. Our queues for refunds are exceptionally long now, so far we have handled over 1,3 million errands but there are still several hundred thousands on queue. We are doing out utmost to handle all refund requests as fast as we possibly can.

@Tom_Benson27 Hi Tom! It's hard to give an estimated waiting time, but we are working as fast as we can to handle all refunds as soon as possible. We truly appreciate your patience. Have a nice weekend! /Alice

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @RichCundill Sorry for the long handling time. We in the SoMe group do not handle refunds. Our personnel are working hard to refund all entitled for refund. You can check with our Sales Office if they can give you more information via chat: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj when open./JH

@CDsunset3 I have no information regarding anyone waiting for 12 months. And if so it must be due to something else than the Covid situation. So best would be to take that with our Customer Care department and see why nothing happened.

@kristinestave Rules might have change so check with a Sales Office. If you order one now, the following rules applies: Ticket is refundable against DKK/NOK/SEK 650/EUR 70/USD 85 per sector/person before commencement of travel. //JH

data.text: @markus_berg1 Hej Markus! Jag beklagar den långa väntetiden! Skicka gärna in ett ärende till oss på följande länk https://t.co/3JiFn8LBsM så kikar vi på detta. Nämn gärna att du blivit hänvisad av oss på Twitter. Hälsningar, Alice
@jonhaugan Hej Jon! Vänligen besök följande länk så kan du läsa om vilka lounger som är öppna. https://t.co/cJPRD4vAnH Ha en fin dag! :) //Alice

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @doidgeylufc Hi.Sorry for the long handling time.Our personnel are working hard to refund all that are entitled for refund.If you requested for refund in March then I suggest you visit our FaceBook page and there send a Direct Message with Ref number etc. Then they can check that all is OK

The Svalbard archipelago, situated between mainland Norway and the North Pole, offer magical sunsets as the polar night approaches. It is the time of year when the sun doesn’t rise above the horizon and days are pitch black – unless the northern light enchants the sky💙 #flysas https://t.co/cMNHp1g5X2

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @irisCHYchan Hi.If you've been waiting for 8 months then I suggest you visiting our FaceBook page and use Direct Message there and send our Sales Office this info together with booking reference etc. They can then check if all looks OK with it. //JH
@RachelBrown49 Hi Rachel, contact your travel agency again, they are now allowed to handle refunds themselves again. ///Regards, Petra

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @RKapitalisti Hi and sorry for the long handling time. If you've waited for more than 6months then I suggest that you visit our FaceBook page and there DM our Sales Office. They can then check if everything looks ok with your reservation and that it is on correct queue etc.
@FreddieKieslich Yes you can use that link. //JH
@daisy_roberts Hi. You should be able to check in the bag around that time. //JH

@RichCundill It is the travel agent that you should contact for a refund. They will send a Refund Application to us and when we have handled it we will send a message back to the travel agent. If you don´t get any respond you have the possibility to send in your own request directly to us.
@TD_F101 We have not yet received approval from the Chinese authorities.
@jamiesimons I´m sorry, but I have no estimated time or date to give you.

@jamiesimons I am so sorry for the long waiting time. We are doing our utmost to handle all refund requests as fast as we possibly can, but due to the huge volumes the handling time is way much longer than normal.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @FreddieKieslich Ok, can you please send all details to us in enclosed link so we can take a look if it have been sent on correct queue to be handled. Refer that you have been sent from twitter//Brgds Petra  https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt
@FreddieKieslich Hi Freddie, which date did you send your errand to us? //Regards, Petra
@TravelingTexan3 Hi, please check with British embassy if that is needed.//Regards, Petra

the local phonenumber for your market. //JH

data.text: @TravelingTexan3 We in the Social Media team don't handle specific cases. You can though try to visit our FaceBook page and there DM our Sales Office and see if they can help you. //JH
@TravelingTexan3 In some cases it can me needed. I suggest you contact the embassy to get all information needed. Or call our Sales Office when they open tomorrow. //JH
@RichCundill Correct.  But she will handle it for you.

data.text: @CallumJewell1 Hi. Either it still haven't been processed at all yet or the request haven't worked. Please call any of our Sales Offices https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj  and they can check if everything looks ok with your ticket. //JH

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@NANASE07920712 If your flight has been cancelled then you need to visit https://t.co/cE0TvFYaMV and there explain what happened in the form to our 
Customer Care department. They will then check why you reveived that amount and change it if incorrect and get back to you. //JH

data.text: @RichCundill Hi Rich, please send all details in enclosed link and refer that you been sent from twitter and we will check that your errand is put on correct queue.///Regards Petra https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt

@Greg_Frain I am sorry for the long waiting time. Due to the huge volumes of tickets to be refunded the handling time is way much longer than normal. As soon as we have reached your errand you will be notified via e-mail.
@emma1058267244 Hi again Emma! We are unable to assist with specific errands over social media, I'm afraid. Kindly contact the Customer Service tomorrow. //Alice

data.text: @emma1058267244 Hello Emma! Please contact us via phone or via our Facebook Messenger Chat and we'll take a look at your booking to see what options you have. You can find our numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Kind regards, Alice

The deicing of SK4417, captured by Air Hostess Ragnhild Mofoss, in front of the scenic and snowy Tromsø peaks. Safety is our highest priority, and deicing prevents ice buildup on the aircraft - keeping it safe during the cold months up North ❄️ #flysas #norway #tromsø https://t.co/oEItGrhNZs

@fredrikwoll Hello, thank you for contacting us.
We have no further information regarding i.e. SK908 at the moment. 
We suggest that you book any of the currently available flights as they should operate according to schedule. 
Best regards, Dennis.

data.text:
@juhannhh Please call any of our Sales Offices and they can check if everything looks ok with it. You can find the contact information and chat here: 
https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

@polisa20 Hi again, there is no more seats open for purchase on that flight that is why it don't show up. Info in my system is that it is planned to go right now. But as it is quite a time to your date this can change.//Brgds Petra
@tideman_io Hej Pontus, tack för din feedback, den tar jag vidare till ansvariga. Önskar dig en trevlig helg och välkommen ombord snart igen. //Vänliga hälsningar Petra
@polisa20 Hi Silje, as it looks like right now it is planned to fly as scheduled. //Regards, Petra
@ashley76242169 Hi Ashley, yes we do! ///Regards, Petra

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @idontlikedisco I am sorry for the long waiting time. Due to the Corona situation around the world we have had to cancel a lot of flights resulting in extreme volumes of ticket to refund. So far we have handled over 1,3 million errands but there are still several hundred thousands on queue.
@Wrightyp5 We are hoping to be able to offer flights from Birmingham to Copenhagen but nothing is set yet so I cannot promise anything at the moment.

@sandye247 Hello Sandy!
I suggest that you contact our customer service directly since we can't assist with booking related issues form social media. 
You can find their number here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Best regards, Dennis.
